title: Exile's Garden
features: Simone Martel's collection of garden themed short stories is a bountiful harvest of characters and situations sure to appeal to the green-thumbed bookworm in your family.
description: Simone Martel's beautifully cultivated garden stories range from the humorous, the tale of an errant water lily, to the profound and unexpected, how inspiration and hope can come from working in a tomato field. Each tale is a verdant-themed treasure and Martel's the perfect storyteller to bring in the harvest. --Sandra Knauf Editor and Publisher, Greenwoman Magazine Author of Zera and the Green Man

Simone Martel is the author of a book of creative nonfiction, The Expectant Gardener. Her shorter nonfiction has appeared in magazines and newspapers including The San Jose Mercury News, Greenprints, Greenwoman, Horticulture Magazine, and Hip Mama. She has had short stories published in a variety of publications including The Main Street Rag, The Long Story, and Fogged Clarity.
